subs.text: The Ukranian flag is flying at the top of my blog today.
This week's Radio Open Source podcast is about the Ukraine invasion and is a must-listen.
subs.rawText: This week's Radio Open Source podcast is about the Ukraine invasion and is a must-listen.  https://t.co/nzQ1NJhWad

subs.text: I tuned into Fox News for a bit, and they’re telling the truth about what’s happening in Ukraine, a more adult version of the truth than CNN.
subs.rawText: I tuned into Fox News for a bit, and they’re telling the truth about what’s happening in Ukraine, a more adult version of the truth than CNN.

subs.text: If a conservative agrees with you and you're a liberal, instead of poking them in the eye, just say "I agree." If not what will you do when you don't have someone to hate? If you still don't get it, put down the keyboard and listen to this song.
Putin is unifying the world, something just a few days ago seemed impossible. The message is simple: we gave you a chance Putin, now go fuck yourself.

I was invited to a future-of-news conference in Moscow in 2011, all expenses paid, by a Russian news agency, Ria Novosti. I almost went but decided in the end not to go. Something didn't feel right about it.
It really is all about you
